entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
